reviews.review: One of the best and difficult FPS game to play...

Was a very good game, until they made it free.
игра отличная правда мне вак дали:))

Good game, enjoyable most of the time, however, it does have its downsides with cheaters and just random WTF moments. Other than that, a real competitive game to enjoy and pass some time with.

8/10

good game but it would be better with less cheats...

for top tier gamers , highly recommend

Fun to play around with your friends

Good game. Easier to play with friends than to queue for a random team and get some random teammates.
